title: Replace Santanu Sir teacher profile image with uploaded photo

requirements.summary: Replace the existing teacher profile image for Santanu Sir in the Teachers component with the newly uploaded photo showing him in a white patterned shirt with a mustache speaking at a microphone
acceptanceCriteria: Santanu Sir's profile card displays the uploaded photo 'image (2)-4.jpg' instead of the current placeholder/image
The image is properly sized and maintains aspect ratio within the teacher profile card
The image styling is consistent with the other teacher profile images (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da)
The image displays correctly on both desktop and mobile views
The image maintains the gold/yellow and maroon accent color scheme of the site

file_operations.description: Update the image source for Santanu Sir's profile card to reference the new uploaded photo at '/assets/generated/santanu-sir-uploaded.dim_400x400.jpg'. Ensure the image is rendered with consistent styling matching the other teacher profile cards (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da) including size, aspect ratio, rounded corners, and hover effects.

requirements.summary: Store the uploaded Santanu Sir photo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: The image file is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
The Teachers component references the correct asset path for Santanu Sir's image
The image loads successfully when the page is rendered

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded photo 'image (2)-4.jpg' showing Santanu Sir in a white patterned shirt with a mustache speaking at a microphone with decorative background including silver streamers and floral wall decorations. The image should be processed to 400x400 dimensions to match the existing teacher profile image format and naming convention.

requirements.summary: Update the TeachersNotes component to reference the new Santanu Sir profile image for the 'Class 4 – 12' notes card, maintaining consistency with the Teachers component
acceptanceCriteria: The TeachersNotes component displays the same Santanu Sir image as the Teachers component
The 'Class 4 – 12' notes card shows the uploaded photo consistently
Image styling matches between Teachers and TeachersNotes components
The image displays properly in the tabbed notes interface

file_operations.description: Update the image source for Santanu Sir's profile in the 'Class 4 – 12' notes tab to reference the new uploaded photo at '/assets/generated/santanu-sir-uploaded.dim_400x400.jpg'. Ensure the image styling is consistent with the Teachers component and displays correctly within the tabbed interface layout.
